description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. 21 to 22 lines per page. Fol. 249b-292b: 12 lines per page. Most texts are written in small naskh in black ink, apparently by the same hand. European glazed paper with watermark. Fol. 1 is a fly-leaf, with inscription. Ownership statements on fol. 2a. Foliation in pencil using Western numerals. There are several notes which mention that these texts were copied at the request of Jaʻfar Muḥammad Kāẓim in Mashhad Ḥusayn [Karbalāʼ] in 1239 (see fol. 2a, with seal), 1234 (fol. 63a, 77a), 1236 (fol. 249a).
author: Bahbahānī, Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Muḥammad Akmal, 1706 or 1707-1791 or 1792
abstract: Collection of texts on Shiʻī law, mostly by Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī (d. 1719), written by the same hand.
contents: 1. fol. 2b-52a: al-Fawāʼid al-Ḥāʼirīyah / Muḥammad Bāqir Bahbahānī (d. 1791 or 2).
2. fol. 52b-54b: [Blank].
3. fol. 55a-61a: Risālah fī al-istiṣḥāb / Muḥammad Bāqir Bahbahānī (d. 1791 or 2).
4. fol. 61b-62b: [Blank].
5. fol. 63a-77a: Risālat Muqaddimat al-wājib / Muḥammad Sharīf Mazandarānī (d. 1829 or 30)
6. fol. 77b-94a: Risālah fī al-ishtirāk / al-Sayyid Mahdī ibn ʻAlī.
7. fol. 95a-169a: Tadhkirah / Muḥammad Jaʻfar Jāblāqī (fl. 1811).
8. fol. 169b-170b: [Blank].
9. fol. 171a-176b: [Taʻlīq ʻalá mabḥath al-zawāl min Sharḥ al-Lumʻah al-Dimashqīyah] / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
10. fol. 176b-181a: Rasāʼil fī al-mawāzin / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
11. fol. 181a-182b: [Risālah fī masʼalat wujūb al-mahr ʻinda mawt al-zawj aw al-zawjah qabl al-dukhūl] / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
12. fol. 182b-183b: [Risālah fī masʼalat al-mahr] / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
13. fol. 183b-188b: [Risālah fī al-daʻwā ʻalá al-mayyit] / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
14. fol. 188b-189a: [Kitāb al-Saʻādāt. Selections] / Jaʻfar al-Ṣādiq (d. 765 or 6).
15. fol. 189a-191a: Risālah fī ṣiḥḥat al-ṣulḥ ʻalá al-majhūl / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
16. fol. 191b-195b: Risālah fī ghusālat al-najāsah / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
17. fol. 195b-204a: Risālah fī anna al-insān baʻd al-mawt ḥayy ḥaqīqatan / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
18. fol. 204a-209a: Masʼalat tajwīz al-ʻudūl min kull sūrah ʻalá al-jaḥd / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
19. fol. 209a-221b: [Risālah fī ajwibat thalāth masāʼil Nāṣir ibn Muḥammad al-Jārūdī] / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
20. fol. 221b-231a: Masāʼil tataʻallaqu bi-al-ʻiṭārah bal bi-muṭlaq al-tijārah [al-Risālah al-ʻAṭṭārīyah] / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
21. fol. 231a-237b: Hal al-ṭalqah wa-al-ṭalqatayn tabqá bi-al-taḥlīl aw tanhadam / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
22. fol. 237b-239b: [Ajwibat masāʼil Yaḥyá ibn Ḥusayn al-Ahsāʼī] / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
23. fol. 239b-244b: [Risālah fī al-najāsah] / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
24. fol. 245a-248a: [Ajwibat masāʼil ʻAbd al-Imām al-Aḥsāʼī] / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Baḥrānī [Ibn ʻUṣfūr] (d. 1718 or 19).
25. fol. 249a-292b: al-Durrah / Muḥammad Mahdī Ṭabāṭabāʼī, Baḥr al-ʻUlūm (d. 1797 or 8).
extent: i, 292, i leaves : paper ; 211 x 142 (145 x 82 ; 155x110 ; 145 x 90) mm. bound to 211 x 150 mm.
creator: Bahbahānī, Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Muḥammad Akmal, 1706 or 1707-1791 or 1792
dlme_creator_ara_latn: Bahbahānī, Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Muḥammad Akmal, 1706 or 1707-1791 or 1792
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
binding_note: Upper and lower covers made of clear brown leather over paper pasteboards, with two blind-tooled fillets encompassing an inner border made of a single blind-tooled fillet.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
